game_name: CricVRX Cricket - Virtual Sports Cricket Game With Real Talents
game_description: CricVRX - Virtual Cricket with Real Talents is the future of cricket, a game which will provide you a platform to relive your love for cricket. Cricket lovers can now live their real cricket dream, as this game is specifically designed for sports and cricket enthusiasts. Fans cheering for you - Walk into the magnificent stadiums, feel the heat as fans cheer you on and live the game like never before. Get familiar with in Minutes - Anyone can play CricVRX irrespective of age, gender or cricketing experience. Experience being a Real Cricketer - Choose team and experience the immersiveness with adaptive commentary. Real ball physics including swing, bounce and spin. Your VR controller becomes your bat where you have to play different shots with perfect timings and placement just like in real cricket. Have fun - by competing with other players by setting the highest game score and see who is going to beat it. Enjoy and have fun and prove your battings skills.
review_1: It was great experience while I'm playing CricVRX . I had great experience n enjoying very much.. graphics are awesome.. keep it up CricVRX.
review_2: Hi, I love playing this game and think it has huge potential. But for the past couple of days, I am running into problems with it. Sometimes when I start the game, the main screen appears but the Start and Settings buttons are non responsive, can't click anything, this behaviour is random. Sometimes it starts, sometimes it just freezes and nothing works. Can you look into it ? please... I really like the game and have been referring to my friends to buy, but with this kind of glitches, I wont be able to do that .... can you please look into it and fix it ?
review_3: I like this game very much , feel like a real stadium, such an amazing experience .
review_4: I liked this game very much . I was giving real experience while playing.great...
review_5: Such an exciting Game. I want to play for whole day
